Posts.Content: Sep 30, 2009 08:43AM - edited Sep 30, 2009 07:16PM by Lisa-Lisa Yep, 41 and just finished chemo in March.  I had many of the same side effects and meds as ccbaby.  If you have any issues during chemo, let the nurses know and they can give you something to help.  I had real sleeping problems and still do but was able to get a little help.  I have a 12, 10, 6 year old and they did great.  I too had my surgery/reconstruction before chemo (thought I was the only one) and it really took a longer time to heal in the chest area with every chemo I had really sore muscles but getting a back/neck massage from hubby really made a difference.  Peaceful healing to all  :)  :)  :)
Posts.Title: anyone 40 Y.O. and having chemo? jennsdogs Lisa-Lisa
